WorkItem.Description:
There are a number of other items that discuss Life Tap, but not this issue, I think.
 
In my spell rotation I often Life Tap towards the beginning of a fight in order to proc the Glyph of Life Tap (gain 20% of Spirit as Spell Power for 20 seconds).  I then typically Life Tap again as it runs out in order to continue the glyph's benefit.   This makes a notable difference in damage output.
 
However, I see no way to include this in my spell rotation in RAWR.  Am I missing something?
 
Also, I suspect that taking this rotation into account could affect how I should gear/gem for Spirit...
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Life Tap with Glyph of Life Tap
